title: Mobile-Based Personalized Online Science Learning Design for Multicultural Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive science courses for professional learners (medical/legal/technical) from diverse cultural backgrounds in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of recommended learning activities (videos/quizzes/discussions) tailored to their cultural and social backgrounds.
Learners can maintain a learning persistence rate of over 60% while performing knowledge-sharing activities with peers at least three times in a mobile environment.
Learners demonstrate a 30% improvement in science-related job application skills compared to prior knowledge, validated through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
